message.content:
We must “build” the Accounts Receivable balance by adding together from sales entries (and sometimes interest receivables) those transactions whose “receive_method” is “Account Receviable” (we note the spelling in the data) so that money has not been received (most of these come as “Unpaid” in the “payment/receipt_status”). In our dataset there are no “Initial” AR‐balances (the “Initial” rows only list cash, bank and fixed assets) so the beginning AR amount is 0. Then we scan the Sale transactions for which the “receive_method” (the column labeled “receive_method”) tells us that the sale is on account:

Below is the list (with id, amount and the value) we identified:

1. Sale20240105009 – amount: 262280.76  
2. Sale20240107015 – amount: 206723.58  
3. Sale20240109020 – amount: 26797.98  
4. Sale20240112025 – amount: 23109.22  
5. Sale20240117035 – amount: 111969.96  
6. Sale20240118039 – amount: 329591.10  
7. Sale20240119041 – amount: 44592.68  
8. Sale20240120042 – amount: 24893.91  
9. Sale20240122045 – amount: 589723.85  
10. Sale20240123047 – amount: 99829.60  
11. Sale20240123048 – amount: 300602.55  
12. Sale20240124050 – amount: 599806.80  
13. Sale20240127055 – amount: 193211.70  
14. Sale20240128057 – amount: 110325.50  

We then add these values step‐by‐step:

• After (1) + (2): 262280.76 + 206723.58 = 469004.34  
• Plus (3): 469004.34 + 26797.98 = 495802.32  
• Plus (4): 495802.32 + 23109.22 = 518911.54  
• Plus (5): 518911.54 + 111969.96 = 630881.50  
• Plus (6): 630881.50 + 329591.10 = 960472.60  
• Plus (7): 960472.60 + 44592.68 = 1,005065.28  
• Plus (8): 1,005065.28 + 24893.91 = 1,029,959.19  
• Plus (9): 1,029,959.19 + 589723.85 = 1,619,683.04  
• Plus (10): 1,619,683.04 + 99829.60 = 1,719,512.64  
• Plus (11): 1,719,512.64 + 300602.55 = 2,020,115.19  
• Plus (12): 2,020,115.19 + 599806.80 = 2,619,921.99  
• Plus (13): 2,619,921.99 + 193211.70 = 2,813,133.69  
• Plus (14): 2,813,133.69 + 110325.50 = 2,923,459.19  

Thus the ending balance (i.e. the total outstanding “accounts receivable”) is 2,923,459.19.

Because there were no initial receivable entries, the beginning value is 0.00.

So the final answer is:

{
  "solution": {
    "Accounts Receivable Initial Value": "0.00",
    "Accounts Receivable End Value": "2923459.19"
  }
}
